titleInfo.title: Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours - Little Old Rag Doll (live radio performance) / Ernest Tubb talks about the birth of his daughter

mods.abstract: Radio broadcast excerpt of a live Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours performance of Little Old Rag Doll. Followed by Ernest Tubb talking with "Judson" (likely Jud Collins) about the birth of his daughter, Erlene Dale Tubb - likely an excerpt from a Grand Ole Opry broadcast (unconfirmed) (see also [ TR001849_2 ]).
